about_the_game: First Playable Demo of Kurama and the Cursed Isles. It contains two areas of the Spring Island and two platformer levels.
detailed_description: First Playable Demo of Kurama and the Cursed Isles. It contains two areas of the Spring Island and two platformer levels.
name: Kurama and The Cursed Isles Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
